author: [okcho...@hoiio.com](https://code.google.com/u/117821913395823954285/)
title: rites of replication is missing

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

Rite of Replication is working fine for me so I suspect something went wrong with your version of Magarena. The easiest way to fix this might be to re-download the game and then import the data from the corrupt version so you don't have to download all the data again.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Two new versions of Magarena have been released since this issue was reported, please try the latest one. If you still have problems with that version then please open a new issue.

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
